{{Location Intro|description=<p>{{If Self|Dadaupa Gorge|It|Dadaupa Gorge}} is the home to three important [[hilichurl]] tribes: the Meaty tribe, the Sleeper tribe, and the Eclipse tribe.</p><p>An important location within it is the [[Forgotten Sword Cemetery|Sword Cemetery]], which witnessed the battle against the monsters of [[Khaenri'ah]].</p>}}

==Descriptions==
{{Description|A mountain located near Mondstadt and inhabited by a large number of hilichurls.<br>This place is known for being dangerous, with the less commonly seen mitachurls and samachurls in the area.|[[Expedition]] description}}

==Trivia==
* Dadaupa in [[Hilichurlian]] means "large mountain" according to the [[Handy Handbook of Hilichurlian]].
